ygData.subject: RE: Bards and rubicite
ygData.msgSnippet: my bard doesnt have one piece of rubicite on him, and im proud of that fact, i cant stand cazic, so many jerks in that zone its sickening, the only reason im
ygData.messageBody:
my bard doesnt have one piece of rubicite on him, and im proud of that fact,
i cant stand cazic, so many jerks in that zone its sickening, the only
reason im looking for rubicite is for my rogue friend, which has a silvery
war axe to spare for rubi if i trade mine off, i also have Hatar's fine silk
turbin which im trying to pawn off for some rubi for him, but no takers on
that either...

Minkin Nehoc
Sol Ro
Level 35 bard in full steel and other plates that look like steel


> -----Original Message-----
> From: Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4 [SMTP:g4mntofcr@...]
> Sent: October 7, 1999 4:05 PM
> To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
> Subject: [eqbards] Bards and rubicite
>
> From: "Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4" <g4mntofcr@...>
>
> Talies,
>
> Wondering where you heard this rumor from? I read on EQVault that rogues
> and shamans were soon going to lose the ability to wear rubicite but saw
> nothing about bards being included. This may end up being a moot point if
> the Solusek bard quests give bard unique armor. I think I would prefer
> doing the quests, no matter how hard, versus camping for rubicite.
>
> Galtin of E'ci
>
> > And just because some of you actually read my messages, here is today's
> > secret: Get your rubicite armour while you still can.
> >
> >
>
> > Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to toren@...
> with the subject lol.
